Gracias! Your order is confirmed.

We’ve received your payment and are packing your Creaciones Colibrí goodies with compostable materials. Look for a shipping email within 1–2 business days.

  • Orders ship from Florida with a tracking link once the label prints.
  • If you’re in Costa Rica, customs forms will be attached with ingredient lists for a smooth arrival.
  • Questions? Write us at hola@creacionescolibri.com.
